top.mkswqi.hander.base_class

类 ActivityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • top.mkswqi.hander.base_class.ActivityManager

  • public class ActivityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by FrankFLY on 2017/4/6. Manage activities, to add / remove / finish them through a list

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private static java.util.List<android.app.Activity> activityList
      ArrayList to store activated activities

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ActivityManager() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void addActivity(android.app.Activity activity)
      Add an activity to the list
      static void finishAll()
      Finish all activities in the list, generally it mean the App has ended.
      static void removeActivity(android.app.Activity activity)
      Remove an activity from the list

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • activityList

        private static java.util.List<android.app.Activity> activityList
        ArrayList to store activated activities

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ActivityManager

        public ActivityManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • addActivity

        public static void addActivity(android.app.Activity activity)
        Add an activity to the list
        参数:
        activity - The activity to add, it should be opened before doing this

      • removeActivity

        public static void removeActivity(android.app.Activity activity)
        Remove an activity from the list
        参数:
        activity - The activity to remove, it should be finished after doing this

      • finishAll

        public static void finishAll()
        Finish all activities in the list, generally it mean the App has ended.
